name: Disaster Artists
description:
Every player picks a brush of a different color, and they all have  paint together a memorable painting. 

However, your brush will keep on painting, 

whatever happens...

2 - 4 players

A game made by Chouqi (@Chouq_i),

Baba (@Creagame),

 and Coco (@MsCocosaur) for the Global Game Jam 2018 ! 

Music and sounds made by Guillaume Faguet.

With the help of Tymus and BDE Supinfogame.

You can follow us on twitter : @hiloqoco
developers: h i l o q o
